Vartopia's Nova Saleforce module provides several key enhancements to the traditional manner in which deal registrations are managed in Salesforce.

The Vartopia module gives you the tools necessary to manage your deal registrations and integrates them into your existing opportunity management process. Each deal registration is linked to the following record types in Salesforce.

  • Partner Account
  • Customer Account
  • Customer Opportunity

Features Include:

  • Automated Partner System Activation
  • Support for Multiple Programs
  • Unique Deal Registration ID Numbers
  • Auto creation of Registration Expiration Date
  • Configurable Registration Statuses

All standard Saleforce functionality can be applied to the deal registrations including:

  • Workflow
  • Tasks & Notifications
  • Reporting and Dashboards
